name: Galaxy Race
description:
Right now, move on the arena, stand on a GraviDeck, start flying and throwing disks, everything in Virtual Reality! Test Galaxy Race and see how new innovative steering system with body balance works.

Play on galactic arena in one of available game modes. Race with friends or other opponents you will meet in Gravitator League or just jump in to our Galactic Campaign and test your skill there!

All this coming soon! Right now download free demo which contains full tutorial of movement on a full-fledged arena, with out any restrictions! Prepare for full version of the game to be able to compete for the title of Intergalactic Champion!

Galaxy Race supports HTC Vive goggles and controller.
Persons with vision defects, to take part in the game, should take care to wear contact lenses.
